The Quranic researcher is that the righteous is a wreath in the two days of the believers of the believers, the misfortune of the misfortunes of the disbelievers and the wing of a meme or the name of the one, that is They fear the work of the disbelievers, and they are woven with their endeavors or a position of lounge, and it was said: a escape from what is for those or a survivor.
